text: Mahmud Sulayman is a Uyghur musician known for Uyghur rock and pop. He performed the film score music for the Uyghur film This Is Not A Dream directed by Shirzat Yazup, based on a short story of the same name by Memtimin Hoshur. He also currently serves as a judge on the reality talent show The Voice of the Silk Road. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Uyghur people
title: Mahmut Sulayman
